title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Comprehensive list of requirements for the neural training assistant project. This includes specifying target user groups (e.g., athletes, students, professionals), desirable features (such as personalized training plans, progress tracking, integration with biometric data, gamification elements, real-time feedback mechanisms), performance expectations (e.g., response time under 2 seconds, scalability to accommodate thousands of users, compatibility with various devices and platforms), and any restrictions or limitations (including data privacy, regulatory compliance, accessibility requirements). The completed document will serve as the basis for the project's development. Additionally, consider potential user feedback mechanisms and methods to ensure ongoing improvement of the system.

title: Design System Architecture for AsistenteEntrenamientoNeural (Revised)
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AsistenteEntrenamientoNeural project. This includes detailed design of AI and neural stimulation components, data flow diagrams, integration points, and addressing key considerations such as security, privacy, and regulatory compliance. The design should also consider scalability, fault tolerance, and performance optimization while ensuring the system's usability and maintainability. The revision incorporates feedback received during the DRAFT phase.
dependencies: Conduct Risk Assessment and Regulatory Compliance Review

title: Develop AI and Machine Learning Models
description: Research, design, and develop the AI and machine learning models for physical and mental performance enhancement.

title: Implement Neural Stimulation Interface
description: Develop the hardware and software components for interfacing with neural stimulation devices.

title: Build User Interface and Experience
description: Design and develop the user interface and experience for the neural training assistant, including user onboarding, personalization, and feedback mechanisms.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management systems for user data, training data, and system logs.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure system integrity, including encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan, including unit tests, integration tests, user acceptance testing, performance testing, security testing, accessibility testing, and non-functional testing such as usability and reliability. The plan should cover all components of the system, including the frontend, backend, and any third-party integrations. Ensure that the plan addresses testing for different environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and considers edge cases, error handling, scalability, performance under heavy loads, and resilience to failures. Additionally, provide clear documentation on testing procedures and results in a way that is easily understandable by both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the neural training assistant, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
